item.title: NOK
item.description: score:64 Chances: Nokia Oyj is getting back on its feet after a couple of challenging years, with a potential pickup in the second half of the year as internet network infrastructure business brings in sales The Cloud and Network Services segment, focused on driving leadership in cloud-native software and as-a-service delivery models, could provide growth opportunities Risks: Nokia reports a double-digit decline in sales and a fall in profit in the last three months of 2023, with operators cutting back on investments into 5G and other technology due to economic uncertainty Slump in demand for 5G mobile phone networking equipment could hurt Nokia and its rivals Score:64 chances characters count - risks characters count = 64
